url.title: GitHub API URL
url.description: GitHub API URL, e.g for GitHub Enterprise: https://my-ghe-host.com/api/v3

reject_unauthorized.title: Enable certificate validation
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the GitHub server

use_faros_graph_repos_selection.title: Use Faros Graph for Repositories selection
use_faros_graph_repos_selection.description: Use Faros Graph for selecting which repositories should be fetched (Faros credentials are required).

organizations.title: Organizations list
organizations.description: List of GitHub organization from which to fetch data. If none passed, all visible organizations for the authenticated user/app will be used.

excluded_organizations.title: Excluded Organizations list
excluded_organizations.description: List of GitHub organization from which data won't be fetched. By default, no organizations are excluded. If organizations list is specified, this list will be ignored.

repositories.title: Repositories list
repositories.description: List of GitHub repositories from which to fetch data. If none passed for an organization, all visible organization repositories for the authenticated user/app will be used.

excluded_repositories.title: Excluded Repositories list
excluded_repositories.description: List of GitHub repositories from which data won't be fetched. By default, no repositories are excluded for an organization. If repositories list contains at least one repository for an organization, repositories for the same organization on this list will be ignored.

enterprises.title: Enterprises list
enterprises.description: List of Enterprises from which to fetch data (only when enterprise streams enabled). Only available using authentication with personal access token.

run_mode.title: Run Mode
run_mode.description: Run mode for selecting the usage of the connector

custom_streams.title: Custom Streams
custom_streams.description: List of streams to run when selected Run Mode is Custom (if empty, all available streams will run)

fetch_teams.title: Fetch teams
fetch_teams.description: Fetch teams from organization to populate teams and team memberships.

copilot_licenses_dates_fix.title: Copilot Licenses Dates Fix
copilot_licenses_dates_fix.description: Fix the licenses dates for Copilot seats when using team assignments (requires Audit Log API)

copilot_metrics_preview_api.title: Copilot Metrics Preview API
copilot_metrics_preview_api.description: Use Copilot Metrics Preview API (/usage) instead of Copilot Metrics GA API (/metrics)

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of organization and repositories to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute organizations and repositories across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources

round_robin_bucket_execution.title: Round Robin Bucket Execution
round_robin_bucket_execution.description: When enabled, syncs rotate through all buckets, processing one bucket per sync. When disabled, only the bucket specified by 'bucket_id' is synced.

bucket_ranges.title: Bucket Ranges
bucket_ranges.description: List of bucket ranges to process when round robin bucket execution is enabled. Each element can be either a single bucket number (e.g., '7') or a range of buckets (e.g., '3-5'). All bucket numbers must be between 1 and 'bucket_total'.

api_key.title: Faros API Key
api_key.description: The Faros API key to use to access the API.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response

commits_page_size.title: Commits Page Size
commits_page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response for commits

pull_requests_page_size.title: Pull Requests Page Size
pull_requests_page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response for pull requests

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the GitHub API

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.

pull_request_cutoff_lag_seconds.title: Pull Request Cutoff Lag (seconds)
pull_request_cutoff_lag_seconds.description: Apply lag to the end cutoff saved in the state. PRs updated after this will be rewritten during the next sync.

copilot_metrics_teams.title: Copilot Metrics Teams
copilot_metrics_teams.description: List of teams to fetch Copilot metrics for. If not specified, all teams for the organization/enterprise will be fetched.

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: Proxy URL to use for the GitHub API
